title: Morcheeba Dive Deep
description:
Morcheeba, Dive Deep  (Rated 5/5)
Label: Echo


Following the brief, ill-judged alliance with Skye Edwards? replacement Daisy Martey on The Antidote, Paul and Ross Godfrey opted not to draft in a full-time replacement for Dive Deep, instead collaborating with various different singers. 

The strategy has brought a freshness to Morcheeba... 


... whose musical palette has expanded way beyond the band?s trip-hop origins. There?s the trad-folk timbre of Bradley Burgess on an electro-funk-folk cover of John Martyn?s ?Run Honey Run?, the delicate fingerstyle guitar and Francophone vocal of Manda on ?Au-DelÃƒÂ ? and a new strain of updated Americana accessed via the Mark Lanegan-style baritone murmur of Thomas Dybdahl, the perfect vessel for songs born out of Paul Godfrey?s battle from the pit of depression. 

A stirring return to form.

9 "Sleep On It" (feat. Thomas Dybdahl) 
10 "Hemphasis"

13 "The Ledge Beyond The Edge"
